N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 3-7.7 - Record keeping

State Regulations
A taxpayer or a combined group that claims either a
business or investment New York net capital loss carryback or carryforward must
submit a copy of its Federal schedule of capital gains and losses used and a
schedule of New York capital gains and losses used for the loss year and for
any year(s) to which the losses are to be carried. A claim for refund based on
a New York capital loss carryback or carryforward must be filed on the forms
and in the manner prescribed by the commissioner. Notes
